content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ home services. May I have your name, please?
Hi, this is Mary. I need some plumbing help at my house.
Thanks Mary! Could you please provide your full address so I can check if we're able to service your location?
Thanks for that. One moment while I verify if your address is within our service area.
I’m having trouble verifying if your address is within our service area. I’m going to request human assistance to help resolve this.
reason: AI unable to verify service area; requested human help.

content: Hello Mary, this is Edgar from XYZ services. Sorry for the delay. I’ve checked your address and can confirm we serve your area. When would be a good time for us to schedule a plumbing visit?
Thank you, Edgar! Tomorrow morning would work well for me.
Great! I’m checking our schedule now for tomorrow morning.
We have an opening at 9 AM tomorrow. Shall I book your appointment for that time?
Yes, please book it for 9 AM tomorrow. Thanks!
Your appointment for plumbing service at 9 AM tomorrow is confirmed, Mary. We'll send you a reminder before your visit. Thank you for choosing XYZ services!
